attributes.action: Tax free pay and bonus for all NHS Staff during the coronaviras pandemic
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff are having a double whammy by paying their taxes and sending their children to school and nursery. They are on the front line of this pandemic and should be rewarded and not financially penalised. We live on the Lincolnshire coast and selfish people are coming from all over the country to their caravans and holiday homes, and nothing is being done to stop this. Please help all NHS staff, and sign this petition
attributes.background: The NHS workers are paying their taxes whilst the remainder of the population is at home and receiving government funding.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
